abstract: A human rights commission judge has recommended the fine in response to a complaint from a woman who, after canceling a pre-wedding appointment, received a racially derogatory voice mail message.
snippet: A human rights commission judge has recommended the fine in response to a complaint from a woman who, after canceling a pre-wedding appointment, received a racially derogatory voice mail message.

headline.main: Hairstylist's Racial Slurs Could Cost Her $22,500
headline.print_headline: Racial Slurs Could Cost A Hairstylist $22,500
